com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.api.sync

Class MessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.api.sync.MessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpmiListener

    public class MessageListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements IpmiListener
    Listens to the IpmiAsyncConnector waiting for concrete message to arrive. Must be registered via IpmiAsyncConnector.registerListener(IpmiListener) to receive messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageListener(ConnectionHandle handle)
      Initiates the MessageListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notify(IpmiResponse response)
      Notifies listener of action that occurred.
      ResponseData waitForAnswer(int tag)
      Blocks the invoking thread until deserved message arrives (tag and handle as specified in MessageListener(ConnectionHandle)).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageListener

        public MessageListener(ConnectionHandle handle)
        Initiates the MessageListener
        Parameters:
        handle - - ConnectionHandle associated with the Connection MessageListener is expecting message from.

    • Method Detail

      • waitForAnswer

        public ResponseData waitForAnswer(int tag)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Blocks the invoking thread until deserved message arrives (tag and handle as specified in MessageListener(ConnectionHandle)).
        Parameters:
        tag - - tag of the expected message
        Returns:
        ResponseData for message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when message delivery fails

      • notify

        public void notify(IpmiResponse response)
        Description copied from interface: IpmiListener
        Notifies listener of action that occurred.
        Specified by:
        notify in interface IpmiListener
        Parameters:
        response - - IpmiResponse being notified
      • IpmiResponseData if answer for request arrived,
      • IpmiError if delivery failed.
